entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
